forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. Potential for heavy rainfall. High near 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, heavy at times. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, possibly heavy, early. Remaining cloudy with showers late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 12C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, possibly heavy, early. Remaining cloudy with showers late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low near 55F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
